components.name: Button
components.description: Trigger actions with multiple variants, sizes, and states.

components.name: Input
components.description: Single-line text input with support for types, placeholders, and disabled state.

components.name: Textarea
components.description: Multi-line text input for longer content.

components.name: Select
components.import: import { Select, SelectContent, SelectItem, SelectTrigger, SelectValue } from "@/components/ui/select"
components.description: Dropdown selection with search and grouping support.

components.name: RadioGroup
components.description: Single selection from a group of options.

components.name: Slider
components.description: Range slider for numeric value selection.

components.name: InputOTP

components.description: One-time password input for verification codes.

components.name: ColorPicker
components.description: Color selection with presets, hex input, and native picker. Custom component.

components.name: FileUpload
components.description: Drag-and-drop and click-to-upload file input. Custom component.

components.name: Rating
components.description: Star-based rating input for reviews and feedback. Custom component.

components.name: Card
components.import: import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardDescription, CardContent, CardFooter } from "@/components/ui/card"
components.description: Container for grouped content with header, body, and footer.

components.name: Badge
components.description: Small label for status, categories, or counts.

components.name: Avatar
components.description: User avatar with image and fallback initials.

components.name: Table
components.import: import { Table, TableHeader, TableBody, TableRow, TableHead, TableCell } from "@/components/ui/table"
components.description: Data table with headers, rows, and responsive layout.

components.name: Timeline
components.description: Chronological event display for activity feeds and histories. Custom component.

components.name: TreeView
components.description: Hierarchical data display for file systems and nested lists. Custom component.

components.name: Kbd
components.description: Keyboard key indicator for documenting shortcuts. Custom component.
